Long-awaited Diablo IV announced
01 Nov 2019, 21:21 by Artyom Bausov
During the BlizzCon 2019 event, Blizzard officially announced Diablo IV, which has been rumored lately. This is the first full sequel to the 2012 game.
So far, the only thing that has been shown is a cinematic trailer. The description says that the game takes place many years after the events of Diablo III, when millions of people were destroyed by the acts of Heaven and Hell.
UPD 21.28: the company also published a gameplay trailer.
Judging by it, in Diablo 4 there will be PvP zones and other interactions between players. For example, trade and communication.
